summary: PEPE jr. - Pepe Jr., the junior of the legendary Pepe the Frog, quickly became a new sensation. Unlike Pepe's sometimes melancholic demeanor, Pepe Jr. was known for his optimistic outlook and knack for spreading joy. Growing up in meme forums and social media, Pepe Jr. stumbled upon a forgotten corner of the internet filled with outdated memes. Seeing potential, he revived these old memes with a modern twist, which quickly gained popularity.
